text: The 1962–63 Algerian Championnat National was the first season of the Algerian Championnat National. USM Alger won the first title after beating MC Alger in the final. ==Criterions of Honour== ===Algiers=== ====Group I==== ====Group II==== ====Group III==== ====Group IV==== ====Group V==== ===Constantine=== ===Oran=== ==Final Groups== ===Algiers=== ===Constantine=== ===Oran=== == Final tournament == ==External links== *1962–63 Algerian Championnat National Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 seasons Category:1962–63 in Algerian football Algeria
title: 1962–63 Algerian Championnat National
